name: UnWound (WoodchuckXL)
description:
Welcome to  UnWound, a 2D platformer where you cannot jump, but only roll and use your grappling hook. This game was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2. All assets were made by me specifically for this Game Jam.

Controls:

A and D - Roll left and right.

Click - Fire your film (Grappling Hook)

Spacebar - Detach from your film (Grappling Hook)
